nodes.bodyText: You specified Number:Dimensionless so you should use a QuantityType here.

Hello, but this is just a decimal without any Type. In the end it is a value of an enum. I don't find any good SmartHomeUnits Type for that. Do you have a proposal what I could give as second param if I go for QuantityType<Dimensionless>?
updateState(channelBatteryStateValue.getUID(),
    new QuantityType<Dimensionless>(getSenecValue(response.energy.batteryState).intValue()),
    SmartHomeUnits.????);
Although if it is really an enum then you shouldn't specify it as Number:Dimensionless in the xml and instead just specify it as a Number instead.
Done the change 👍 Both jars in the opener are updated.
You switched the item-type to Number so you need to change this back and use DecimalType again.
OK, done that. JARs in the opener are updated again 👍
